text: eṉiṉum (napiyē!) Avarkaḷil kalviyil uṟuti mikkavarkaḷum, uṇmai nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷum, um mītu aruḷappaṭṭa (ivvētat)taiyum, umakku muṉṉar aruḷappaṭṭirunta (vētaṅkaḷ yā)vaṟṟaiyum meyyākavē nampikkai koḷvārkaḷ toḻukaiyaiyum kaṭaippiṭittut toḻupavarkaḷ; jakāttum koṭuttu varupavarkaḷ; allāhvaiyum iṟuti nāḷaiyum nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷ. Ākiya ivarkaḷukku (maṟumaiyil) makattāṉa kūliyai nām koṭuppōm
